feed.title: The Latest News from the UK and Around the World | Sky News
feed.description: Sky news delivers breaking news, headlines and top stories from business, politics, entertainment and more in the UK and worldwide.

items.title: PM understands British Army is 'in urgent need of recapitalisation' - defence minister
items.description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and Chancellor Jeremy Hunt understand the army is "in urgent need of recapitalisation" and "there is a budget coming", a defence minister has said.
items.content: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and Chancellor Jeremy Hunt understand the army is "in urgent need of recapitalisation" and "there is a budget coming", a defence minister has said.

items.title: Teachers' strike to go ahead after education secretary 'squandered the opportunity' to avoid action
items.description: Talks between the education secretary and the teaching unions have failed and the biggest teachers' strike in years will go ahead.
items.content: Talks between the education secretary and the teaching unions have failed and the biggest teachers' strike in years will go ahead.

items.title: Firefighters vote to strike after real-terms earnings 'drop by 12%'
items.description: Firefighters are set to stage strike action in a row over pay after experiencing what they say is a cut in real-terms pay.
items.content: Firefighters are set to stage strike action in a row over pay after experiencing what they say is a cut in real-terms pay.

items.title: Woman killed by dogs in Surrey is named
items.description: A woman who was killed by dogs in Surrey has been named.
items.content: A woman who was killed by dogs in Surrey has been named.

items.title: Commissioner removes himself from BBC chairman investigation
items.description: The Commissioner for Public Appointments has removed himself from the investigation into the hiring of the BBC's chairman after revealing he had met him "on previous occasions".
items.content: The Commissioner for Public Appointments has removed himself from the investigation into the hiring of the BBC's chairman after revealing he had met him "on previous occasions".

items.title: PM says he acted 'decisively' in sacking Zahawi following tax affairs row
items.description: Rishi Sunak has insisited he acted "decisively" in sacking Nadhim Zahawi as chairman of the Conservative Party after a row over his tax affairs.
items.content: Rishi Sunak has insisited he acted "decisively" in sacking Nadhim Zahawi as chairman of the Conservative Party after a row over his tax affairs.

items.title: Mobile phone of missing dog walker found
items.description: A major search is under way to find a 45-year-old woman from Inskip, Lancashire, who vanished while walking her dog.
items.content: A major search is under way to find a 45-year-old woman from Inskip, Lancashire, who vanished while walking her dog.

items.title: JD Sports cyber attack may have exposed millions of names, numbers and addresses
items.description: JD Sports is contacting customers who have been affected by a cyber attack that may have exposed their personal details.
items.content: JD Sports is contacting customers who have been affected by a cyber attack that may have exposed their personal details.

items.title: Suicide bomber kills at least 47 in Pakistan mosque attack
items.description: At least 47 people have been killed and 150 injured after a suicide bomber struck a mosque in Pakistan.
items.content: At least 47 people have been killed and 150 injured after a suicide bomber struck a mosque in Pakistan.

items.title: Girl, 5, miraculously walks away after she is hit by car and sent crashing through window
items.description: CCTV has captured the moment a drunk driver hit a motorcyclist before ploughing into a five-year-old girl - who miraculously walked away from the crash.
items.content: CCTV has captured the moment a drunk driver hit a motorcyclist before ploughing into a five-year-old girl - who miraculously walked away from the crash.
